details.Description: Founded in 2014, Trifecta Capital is India's leading alternate financing platform for new economy businesses with products spanning venture debt, growth equity, and financial advisory solutions. The firm has since 2015, invested more than INR 6,000 crores of capital across 200 plus start-ups, through three venture debt funds and a growth equity fund. The firm has also managed capital flows of more than Rs. 18,000 crores for both start-ups and other venture capital firms, through its financial solutions practice. The Trifecta portfolio has 21 unicorns and more than 12 unicorns.
